PhpStorm Custom Keys phpstorm private.phpstorm
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F11, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::RETURN, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F7, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::I, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F6, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::1, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F5, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::F12, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND
